comment.author: 8368002@N03
comment._content: The newspaper spelled Pittsburgh wrong! Perhaps they ran out of space, but why couldn't they have said "Pittsburgh, P.A."

comment.author: 39350536@N08
comment._content: Hello, jvaningen74! According to the Carnegie Library of Pittsburgh, the name has been spelled "Pittsburgh" since the city's founding in 1758, except for the period between 1890 and 1911. You can read more here: www.carnegielibrary.org/exhibit/hname.html Thanks for commenting and we hope you continue to enjoy the newspapers.
